attributes.additional_details: We believe the government can do more to help with mental health. This is a sensitive subject what needs to be taken far more seriously!
attributes.background: We want the government to do more for mental health! Far too many people are suffering and being ignored.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about existing Government action regarding mental health, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase funding for NHS mental health services: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581222

Fund a 24-hour NHS mental health helpline and treatment: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585974

If you want the Government to take an action different to the above petitions, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
